title: Write a Video Script
description: A copywriter needs to write the script for a 2-minute explainer video.

tasks.description: Outline the key talking points for the video.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a structured outline for the script.

tasks.description: Write the voiceover script, ensuring the language is clear, concise, and matches the brand's tone.
Read the script aloud to check its timing, ensuring it fits within the 2-minute timeframe.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the length of the script is appropriate.

tasks.description: Add suggestions for on-screen visuals or animations that correspond with the voiceover.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds visual direction to the script document.
